mdRecord.dcterms:title: Women and Man at Seashore, Western United States, ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows a group consisting of three women and one man seated on a large piece of driftwood at an unidentified seashore. Their clothing - heavy wool - suggests that the photograph was taken in the late fall, winter, or early spring. Woman at far left is holding an open umbrella. Image faded to yellow A crescent-shaped tan portion can be seen at left
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
